provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Road Traffic (Amend- Short title,
ment) Act, 2002 and shall be read and construed as """";
one with the Road Traffic Act (hereinafter referred to as commence-
the principal Act) and all amendments thereto, and shall come mcnt.
into operation on a date to be appointed by the Minister
by notice published in the Gazette.
2               [No. 14]         The Road Traffic (Amendment) Act, 2002
Amendment         2. Subsection (1) of section 4 of the principal Act is
of section
4 of prin-      amended by inserting immediately after the words "these
cipal Aot.
                Authorities" the words "or to such private entity or person
                as the Island Traffic Authority may from time to time
                designate".
